title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 601.1 - Free service prohibited
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 601.1 - Free service prohibited

State Regulations

Each and every telephone corporation within this State
subject to the jurisdiction of this commission shall be informed by circular
that the practice of free trial service installations is regarded by this
commission as unlawful, and the company engaging in the same is subject to the
forfeiture and penalties prescribed by section
25
of the

Public Service Law. Note: The above section was promulgated in 1911 as case No. 2108
(second District). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
601.1

The above section was promulgated in 1911 as case No. 2108 (second District). State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
